title: Art, people, feelings
creator_credit: Paul Burnford, Paul Burnford Film Productions and Pyramid Films
brief_description: The relationship between human emotions and the art created is illustrated by a selection of artistic works which span all periods of history and a variety of subjects. Shows ways in which artists use many materials and methods to translate their personal feelings into visual forms: murals, landscapes, portraits, posters, billboards, abstract paintings, cartoons, pop art, sculpture and motion pictures. Suitable for secondary level years 7-12.
